articles.author: Sam Reynolds
articles.title: Hong Kong's Securities Regulator Now Considering Spot Crypto ETFs: Bloomberg - CoinDesk
articles.description: The move comes a month after authorities in the City updated financial regulations to allow for retail investors to buy spot crypto ETFs.
articles.content:
Hong Kongs securities regulator, the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), is moving towards allowing retail investors to buy spot crypto Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs).
We welcome proposals using … [+1508 chars]

articles.author: Maha Dahan, Olesya Astakhova
articles.title: Saudi Arabia, Russia to continue additional voluntary oil cuts - Reuters
articles.description: Top oil exporters Saudi Arabia and Russia confirmed on Sunday they would continue with their additional voluntary oil output cuts until the end of the year as concerns over demand and economic growth continue to weigh on crude markets.
articles.content: DUBAI, Nov 5 (Reuters) - Top oil exporters Saudi Arabia and Russia confirmed on Sunday they would continue with their additional voluntary oil output cuts until the end of the year as concerns over d… [+2258 chars]
